page.title: 12USE OF THE LOCAL MEDIA.
page.content: {As the result of a survey completed by {adults in the Gildersome,New Farnley {and Lower Wortley areas we found: 93.75% watch T.V.The most popular T.V. programmes were:1.Coronation St.=30% 2.Wildlife=17.5% 3.Dallas=17.5%. 4.Emmerdale Fm.=16.25% 5.News=16.25% 6.Sport=10%. {91.25% of all people interviewed list- ened to the radio;80% daily,11.25% weekly and 8.75% never listen to the radio.Of the radio stations listed in the survey 36.25% prefered radio 1, 13.75% radio 2, 2.5% radio 3, 5% radio 4 & 32.5% local radio stations. {75% of all people intrerviewed read a newspaper daily, 8.75% weekly, 12.5% occasionally & 3.75% never read a newspaper.From our survey we assume the average adult watches T.V.,listen to the radio daily, prefers Radio 1 and reads a newspaper daily.
